ARIANRHOD.SettingAutoIncapacitationHint: Automatically show incapacitation notification when HP reaches 0.

ARIANRHOD.GuideCombatStartSteps:
1. Select tokens to participate (Ctrl+click for multiple)
  2. Click Create Combat in the combat tracker
  3. Initiative auto-calculated from Action Value (AGI + equipment)
  4. Click Begin Combat to start the first round
  5. Check turn order and action economy in the Combat Dock (top of screen)
ARIANRHOD.GuideAttackFlowSteps:
1. Attacker sheet â†’ Combat tab â†’ equipped weapon's Attack button
  2. Attack dialog: confirm modifier, set fate dice â†’ Roll
  3. Chat attack card â†’ click target's Evasion Roll button
  4. Evasion dialog: confirm modifier â†’ Roll
  5. Hit/miss auto-determined (defender wins ties)
  6. On hit â†’ click Roll Damage button
  7. Damage card â†’ Apply button to auto-reduce target HP

Critical: 2+ dice showing 6 / Fumble: all dice show 1
ARIANRHOD.GuideSkillActivationSteps:
1. Character sheet â†’ Skills tab â†’ click Activate on the skill
  2. MP is automatically consumed (warning if insufficient)
  3. Timing conditions auto-checked (major/minor/passive etc.)
  4. Skill card appears in chat (with effect description)

Using major/minor skills while hidden auto-breaks stealth

Tip: During combat, use the Skill Panel (âš¡ button) for one-click skill activation.
ARIANRHOD.GuideSkillPanelSteps:
1. Click the lightning icon (âš¡) in the combat dock header to open/close the skill panel
  2. Top shows action economy badges: Mj (Major) / Mn (Minor) / Mv (Move) â€” green=available, red=used
  3. MP remaining shown with color coding (yellow below 50%, red below 25%)
  4. Filter tabs to sort skills by timing (All / Action / Minor / Free / Reaction)
  5. Click a skill row or the ðŸŽ² button for one-click activation
  6. Skills are disabled when MP is insufficient or actions are exhausted (tooltip shows reason)

The skill panel shows only the current turn character's skills and auto-refreshes on turn change
ARIANRHOD.GuideCoverSteps:
1. Click Cover button on the damage card
  2. Select coverer from allies in the same engagement
  3. Damage recalculated with coverer's defense (phys/mag)
  4. Damage applied to coverer's HP
  5. Coverer becomes action complete (no actions this turn)

Mob enemies cannot cover
ARIANRHOD.GuideIdentifySteps:
1. Select enemy token in combat â†’ Identify button on token HUD
  2. INT check vs enemy identify DC
  3. Success: name, type, level, element, defense comparison, skills revealed
  4. Failure: cannot retry on the same enemy

Unidentified enemies show as "???" in combat dock
ARIANRHOD.GuideMovementSteps:
1. Token HUD â†’ click Move button
  2. Select option: free move / enter engagement / disengage
  3. Enter engagement: select target token â†’ melee relationship created
  4. Disengage: break engagement (GM decides opportunity attack)
  5. Uses 1 move action

Cannot move through engaged opponents (blockade)
ARIANRHOD.GuideFlightHiddenSteps:
Flight
  • Evasion +2 bonus
  • Immune to blockade by non-flying enemies
  • Managed via flight status icon on token
Stealth
  • Evasion +4 bonus
  • Cannot be targeted by group/area attacks
  • Auto-breaks when using major/minor actions
  • Cannot enter stealth while engaged with enemies

Discover: Token HUD â†’ Discover button â†’ opposed SEN check
ARIANRHOD.GuideSituationCheckSteps:
1. Scene Controls â†’ Situation Check icon (GM only)
  2. Select tab: Gather Info / Negotiate / Appraise
  3. Choose target PC, select ability (SEN default for info gathering)
  4. Set DC (preset buttons for quick setup)
  5. Click Roll â†’ check dialog
  6. Result shown in chat with success/failure badge

Failed appraisal cannot be retried on the same item
ARIANRHOD.GuideTrapSteps:
1. GM: drag trap item to chat or send from item sheet
  2. Chat trap card â†’ Detect button â†’ SEN check vs detect DC
  3. After detection â†’ Disarm button â†’ DEX check vs disarm DC
  4. Success/failure shown as badges in chat
ARIANRHOD.GuideAbilityCheckSteps:
1. Character sheet â†’ Abilities tab â†’ dice icon next to ability
  2. Check dialog: confirm modifier, enter DC (optional)
  3. Set fate dice (up to LUK bonus)
  4. Roll â†’ result shown in chat
ARIANRHOD.GuideRestSteps:
1. Character sheet â†’ Combat tab â†’ Rest button
  2. HP/MP fully restored
  3. All bad statuses removed
  4. Recovery result shown in chat
ARIANRHOD.GuideConsumableSteps:
1. Character sheet â†’ Items tab â†’ Use button on consumable (potion/food)
  2. Recovery dice auto-rolled (based on item data)
  3. HP or MP recovery auto-applied
  4. Usage result card shown in chat
ARIANRHOD.GuideLevelUpSteps:
1. When experience is sufficient, Level Up! badge appears on sheet
  2. Click badge â†’ Level Up Wizard starts
  3. Step 1: Choose growth pattern (A / B / C)
  4. Step 2: Confirm ability increases
  5. Step 3: Acquire new skills (from compendium)
  6. Step 4: Final confirmation â†’ apply
  7. Growth log auto-recorded
ARIANRHOD.GuideSessionEndSteps:
1. Scene Controls â†’ Session End icon (GM only)
  2. Enter experience for each PC (bulk set available)
  3. Enter connection purchases, guild contribution
  4. Apply All â†’ auto-distribute exp/connections/guild
  5. Session summary card shown in chat
ARIANRHOD.GuideStatusEffectsContent:
Poison[2D] physical damage at round end
DiseaseMax HP halved
StunEvasion dice -1D
SealCannot use skills
SlowCannot move
WitherCannot attack
CharmMay attack allies
BerserkNo skills, attack nearest target
FearAttempt to flee combat
IncapacitatedHP 0 or below, no actions
PetrifyNo actions, phys def +10
FlightEvasion +2, blockade immune
StealthEvasion +4, cannot be targeted

Toggle status icons on tokens to apply/remove
ARIANRHOD.GuideElementsContent:
6 elements: Fire, Water, Wind, Earth, Light, Dark

Opposing pairs:
  • Fire â†” Water
  • Wind â†” Earth
  • Light â†” Dark
When casting magic:
  • Weakness (opposing): magic defense ignored (x0) â€” green highlight
  • Reinforced (same): magic defense doubled (x2) â€” red highlight
  • No element or non-opposing: magic defense applied normally
ARIANRHOD.GuideFSJudgmentSteps:
1. Scene Controls â†’ FS Setup icon (GM only)
  2. Set difficulty, completion target, max rounds, support check DC
  3. Click Start FS â†’ switches to progress phase
  4. Select PC â†’ choose ability â†’ FS Check roll
  5. Progress changes based on check result
  6. Click Next Round â†’ automatic 1D6 event roll
  7. FS ends when target reached or rounds exhausted â†’ click End FS

Event Table: 1=Enemy / 2=Injury(1D6 dmg) / 3-4=Nothing / 5=Fortune(+1) / 6=Discovery(+2)
ARIANRHOD.GuideItemShopSteps:
1. Scene Controls â†’ Shop icon (GM only)
  2. Select buyer (PC) â†’ check guild gold balance
  3. Buy mode: select category tab (Weapons/Armor/Accessories/Consumables) â†’ click Buy
  4. Sell mode: select item from PC inventory â†’ click Sell (default 50% price)
  5. Guild support Discount auto-applies -10% to purchases
  6. Guild support Guild Shop auto-applies +10% to sell prices

Use the search filter to quickly find items
ARIANRHOD.GuideGuildSupportContent:
Guild supports have passive effects and active activations.

Passive Effects (auto-applied):
  • Blessing: Damage taken -2 (stackable)
  • Marauder: Drop item roll +1D (stackable)
  • Attack Boost: Attack damage +3 (stackable)
  • Defense Boost: Phys/Mag Def +4 (stackable)
  • Elite: Max HP/MP +5 (stackable)
  • Discount: Shop purchase -10%
  • Acceleration: Initiative +5 (stackable)
Active Activation (use from guild sheet):
  • Drops of Life: Heal all members HP/MP (1/scenario)
  • Resurrection: Restore all HP to max (1/scenario)
  • Divine Blessing: Restore all MP to max
  • Appraiser: Auto-appraisal success (costs 100G)

Reset uses via the reset button (â†») on the guild sheet
ARIANRHOD.GuideRacePassiveContent:
HuulinVersatile: ability +1 x3 (manually applied at creation)
EldanaanDarkvision: immune to darkness penalty
NeverfLight Protection: light element magic damage -5
FilbolHalf: small equipment only
VanaFlight Capable: can use flight status
DominionDarkvision: immune to darkness penalty

Race passives auto-applied based on character race selection
ARIANRHOD.GuideDropItemsSteps:
1. Drop roll triggered on enemy defeat (2D6 + bonuses)
2. Click 'Collect' button on the chat card
3. Choose PC inventory or guild gold
4. Fate dice & Drop Shot can add bonus dice
5. Guess Well: adjust result Â±1 step after roll
6. Treasure Hunt: extra drop roll after damage
7. Drop summary card shown at combat end
